page.title: 10Dennis's Day Part 1
page.content: I get up at 6.30. I get my clothes on and go downstairs, then I have my breakfast; I have 2 bowls of cornflakes, bacon and some toast. Then when I have finished I go back upstairs and wash my face and hands. I go back downstairs and brush my teeth while my Mum has a cup of coffee, drinking chocolate or cocoa. Then we go out to the bus which usually comes at 8.20. When we get to school we have a little playtime until 9 o'clock when school starts. When we go in we sit and read while Mrs. Watts does the register. At 9.10 it is Assembly, where we have hymns, prayers and a story which Mrs. Harrington reads. Then we go back into class and work until 10.30 when it is playtime. When we go out we race because the first one gets gold, the next silver, then bronze.
